name: Super Shovel Fighter
description:
In Super Shovel Fighter you play as a gravedigger, armed with his trusty shovel, fighting the undead. A fiendish demon has brought back your pervious clients including your wife! You must fight through Zombies, Skeletons, possessed birds and bats to reach the demon. After you defeat him there is only one thing left to do, put you wife to rest again.

Super Shovel Fighter is a 2.5D beat ‘em up.
